billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Directs public service commission to require electric and steam corporations to provide rate reductions or refunds for inadequate or interrupted service
summary: Directs the public service commission to require electric and steam corporations to provide rate reductions or refunds for inadequate or interrupted service; requires electric corporations, in cities having a population of one million or more, to reimburse ratepayers for damages to and losses of property and business caused by power outages lasting more than 12 hours during any 24-hour period; requires steam corporations, in cities having a population of one million or service interruptions lasting more than 48 hours.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to the power of the public service commission to require refunds of or reductions in rates for inadequate or interrupted electric or steam service
